content: It’s smart to be cautious if the upgrade screen looks unusual and asks for your password. It could be legitimate, but to be safe, try upgrading via the terminal with `sudo apt update` and `sudo apt upgrade` to avoid suspicious pop-ups. If the screen still seems off, don’t enter your password and cancel the upgrade. Always trust your instincts with password requests.
creator: sanjay210no
